item.title: Ben Tossell
item.description: Twitter: @bentossell Webpage: https://bentossell.com AI newsletter Ben’s Bites Career Community lead at Product Hunt Founded Makerpad a no-code educational website, which was acquired by Zapier in March 2021

item.title: Where It Happens
item.description: The future of business is community-based. The biggest companies and creators have community at its core. Where It Happens is the show hosted by Greg Isenberg (CEO Late Checkout, Advisor Reddit) that finds the most interesting entrepreneur and creators breaks down how they do it. Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/@whereithappens/featured Host: Greg Isenberg

item.title: Where It Happens/How Writers Can Be More Productive Using AI with Ben Tossell
item.description: Metadata series: Where It Happens guests: Ben Tossell release-date: 2022-11-30 Transcript voice2txt: otter.ai, partly corrected Greg Isenberg 00:00 Welcome back to the show, the Where It Happens show, I’m bringing on my friend Ben Tossell today. He is the no code guide. But more recently, he’s become almost the AI guy. He’s got this incredible newsletter called Ben’s Bites, where he does all the work for you and kind of just looks at the most interesting AI stories.

Impressum This is the personal page of Daniel Bender located at https://aidfulai.com.
